name: ChartLegendFormat
description: Encapsulates the format properties of a chart legend.

info.title: Office JavaScript Add-in API
info.description: Office JavaScript Add-in API for June fork

properties.name: font
properties.description: Represents the font attributes such as font name, font size, color, etc. of a chart legend.

properties.name: fill
properties.description: Represents the fill format of an object, which includes interiorbackground formating information.
